2020.context: monday.com Ltd. is a work operating system platform focused on project management, CRM, and workflow automation. IPO. Work management platform growing.

competitors.name: Asana
competitors.notes: Work management platform with tasks, projects, timelines, and portfolios for clean task tracking. Strong competitor for marketing teams prioritizing task management and collaboration over visual customization.

competitors.name: Trello
competitors.notes: Visual project management tool specializing in the Kanban method with boards, lists, and cards. Particularly user-friendly for small teams wanting visual simplicity without complexity.

competitors.name: Wrike
competitors.notes: Enterprise work management platform with projects, tasks, proofing, and reporting for complex workflows. Strong for large marketing teams and enterprises needing advanced permissions and robust reporting.

competitors.name: Smartsheet
competitors.notes: Spreadsheet-based project management platform with built-in templates. Appeals to users familiar with Excel/Google Sheets, offering team collaboration tools and workflow automation.

competitors.name: ClickUp
competitors.notes: Productivity platform with tasks, docs, wikis, goals, and dashboards for highly customizable project management. Offers extreme flexibility for power users and large teams.

competitors.name: Teamwork
competitors.notes: Comprehensive task and project management platform offering vast range of features and strong customer support including phone-based support on all plans.

competitors.name: Jira
competitors.notes: Agile project management software with scrum boards, Kanban boards, and customizable dashboards. Particularly strong for software development teams tracking projects in real-time.

competitors.name: Airtable
competitors.notes: Spreadsheet and database hybrid with project management features, ideal for data-intensive projects and general information management.

competitors.name: Notion
competitors.notes: Hybrid platform combining document, wiki, and project management features, offering versatility beyond traditional project management tools.

competitors.name: Microsoft Project
competitors.notes: Traditional project management software for teams relying heavily on Microsoft ecosystem, designed to help complete complex projects with enterprise-grade features.

2024.context: monday.com Ltd. is a work operating system platform focused on project management, CRM, and workflow automation. monday AI assistant. CRM and dev products expansion.

competitors.name: ClickUp
competitors.notes: Leading alternative offering extreme customization and comprehensive features. Provides more functionality in lower tiers with 'free forever' option including more features than Monday.com's free plan. Pricing $5-$19/user/month with strong task management and collaboration features.

competitors.name: Asana
competitors.notes: Best for visual project management with boards and cards, offering cleaner interface and better intuitive visualization of project data. Pricing $10.99-$24.99/user/month for streamlined task management without visual clutter.

competitors.name: Wrike
competitors.notes: Cloud-based enterprise work management with built-in timeline capabilities, Kanban boards, and Gantt charts. Offers more extensive integrations and flexibility for team members to work in their preferred view.

competitors.name: Smartsheet
competitors.notes: Spreadsheet-like interface familiar to Excel users. Main differentiation from Monday.com lies in the classic spreadsheet interface, appealing to teams preferring traditional spreadsheet workflows.

competitors.name: Jira
competitors.notes: Agile platform specialized for software development teams, offering complete contrast to spreadsheet views. Features scrum boards, Kanban boards, and real-time project tracking customizable dashboards.

competitors.name: Trello
competitors.notes: Simple Kanban-focused approach with excellent customer support. Best for teams wanting to get organized without being overwhelmed by features, offering Kanban-dominant workflow.

competitors.name: Hive
competitors.notes: Integrated project management and collaboration platform. Offers most competitive entry pricing with Starter plan at $5/user/month and Teams plan at $12/user/month with unlimited capabilities.

competitors.name: Teamwork
competitors.notes: Rated best overall alternative due to comprehensive task and project management tools, superior customer support, and easy interface. More expensive but offers phone-based support on all plans.

competitors.name: Notion
competitors.notes: Hybrid platform becoming essential for organization and team collaboration, with everything in one place including linked documents, notes, tasks, and comments. Built-in AI tools for creating tables and flowcharts.

competitors.name: nTask
competitors.notes: Free alternative offering simple project management capabilities for teams seeking budget-friendly options with essential features.

competitors.name: Celoxis
competitors.notes: Comprehensive project management platform competing on enterprise features and advanced project portfolio management capabilities.

competitors.name: AFFiNE
competitors.notes: Emerging alternative for project management offering privacy-focused and open-source approach to work management.

2025.context: monday.com Ltd. is a work operating system platform focused on project management, CRM, and workflow automation. Work OS platform. Competing with Asana, Smartsheet, Microsoft.

competitors.name: ClickUp
competitors.notes: Rated best overall alternative by G2. Productivity platform offering similar customization and visual task-management features but with more functionality in lower tiers. Best for large teams (10-50+ people) or power users wanting extreme flexibility with tasks, docs, wikis, goals, and dashboards.

competitors.name: Wrike
competitors.notes: Enterprise work management platform for complex workflows with projects, tasks, proofing, and reporting. As of November 2025, showing significant growth with new AI features, enhanced community support, and more frequent updates. Best for large marketing teams (20-100+ people) requiring advanced permissions and custom workflows.

competitors.name: Smartsheet
competitors.notes: Modern work management platform for managing projects, automating processes, and scaling workflows in one central platform. Competes with efficient and highly customizable interface for time management, collaboration, and communication.

competitors.name: Asana
competitors.notes: Work management platform with tasks, projects, timelines, and portfolios for clean task tracking without visual clutter. Strong for marketing teams (5-30 people) prioritizing task management and collaboration.

competitors.name: Trello
competitors.notes: Visual project management tool using boards, lists, and cards for simple task tracking. Less complicated and visually pleasing alternative organizing tasks on colorful Kanban boards. Best for small marketing teams (1-10 people) wanting visual simplicity.

competitors.name: Notion
competitors.notes: All-in-one workspace that has become essential for organization and team collaboration. Everything lives in one place with easily linked documents, notes, tasks, and comments. Features built-in AI tools for creating tables, flowcharts, and rewording text.

competitors.name: Hive
competitors.notes: Project management and collaboration platform offering integrated workflow solutions with competitive pricing and comprehensive productivity tools for teams.

competitors.name: Teamwork
competitors.notes: Comprehensive work management platform with vast range of task and project management features, strong customer support, and user-friendly interface.

competitors.name: Workfront (Adobe)
competitors.notes: Cloud-based Enterprise Work Management solution helping marketing, IT, and enterprise teams manage excessive email, redundant status meetings, and disconnected tools with unified platform.

competitors.name: GoodDay
competitors.notes: All-in-one work management platform trusted by Fortune 500 companies and fast-growing startups. Brings project planning, task tracking, goal setting, and reporting into one streamlined system.

competitors.name: Miro
competitors.notes: Best for visual collaboration and innovation with over 60 million users. Comprehensive suite includes workshops, project management, and content/data visualization capabilities for seamless creation.

competitors.name: ProofHub
competitors.notes: Project management and team collaboration platform offering centralized hub for task management, planning, and document organization.
